Korean People's Greatest Holidays to Be Commemorated in Nigeria
articles.content:
Korean People's Greatest Holidays to Be Commemorated in Nigeria 
   Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Nigerian preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and Feb. 16 was held in Abuja on Jan. 22.
 The ceremony elected the vice-president of the Senate of the Nigerian National Assembly chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee set a commemoration period from Jan. 22 to Apr. 22 and discussed its plan to widely introduce the wise leadership of the peerless great persons and their immortal exploits and the reality of Songun Korea and intensify the solidarity movement for supporting the just cause of the Korean people in the period.

Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Late Yu Kyong Ae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Late Yu Kyong Ae
   Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of the late Yu Kyong Ae, winner of "Kim Il Sung Order," Labor Hero and People's Actress, today, expressing deep condolences over her death.
